name: Instant Pot™ Hearty Minestrone

ingredients.name: Marinara Sauce Mix or Italian Seasoning
Nourish Broth Mix or Vegetable Broth Mix

preparation: Drain and rinse lentils. Add lentils, tomatoes, water, vegetables, pasta, and mixes to an 8-quart programmable pressure cooker. Stir to combine.

Secure lid. Place steam release valve in SEALING position. Press MANUAL button, select HIGH, and set the time to 5 min. This will take some time to get up to temperature before the timer starts to count down.
When the cook time has finished, naturally release pressure for 10–15 min.
Using a long-handled spoon, push the steam release valve to VENTING position. Release pressure completely before opening lid.
tips: Replace lentils with white beans or ground meat.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 whole-grain roll and 1 cup leafy greens with a squeeze of lemon juice.

products.name: Marinara Sauce Mix
summary: A simple, kid-friendly sauce that speaks volumes, Marinara is packed with the bright flavour of garlic, oregano, and basil. Pair it with your fave pasta and use it as a base layer for delicious homemade pizza.

products.name: Italian Seasoning
summary: A robust Italian blend perfect for pizza, bread dough, pasta or flatbreads.

products.name: Nourish Broth Mix
summary: Rich taste of slowly simmered chicken with garden-fresh flavors of onion, celery, and herbs. Just add water!
